Uses of Class
tijos.framework.devicecenter.TiPWM

  • Packages that use TiPWM 
    Package Description
    tijos.framework.devicecenter
    Device bus related classes, such as GPIO I2C, PWM, etc., can be used to develop the sensor which is not supported in the standard library
    tijos.framework.transducer.led
    LED classes

    • Uses of TiPWM in tijos.framework.devicecenter

      Methods in tijos.framework.devicecenter that return TiPWM 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TiPWM TiPWM.open(int portID, int... channelIDs)
      Open the TiPWM port by port id and the channel list, and return the object
      NOTE: remapID is 0, that is default location
      static TiPWM TiPWM.openRemap(int portID, int remapID, int... channelIDs)
      Open the TiPWM port by port id, remap id and the channel list, and return the object

    • Uses of TiPWM in tijos.framework.transducer.led

      Constructors in tijos.framework.transducer.led with parameters of type TiPWM 
      Constructor and Description

      TiRGBLED initialization, default:highLevel=false
      TiRGBLED(TiPWM pwm, int redChannelID, int greenChannelID, int blueChannelID, boolean highLevel)
      TiRGBLED initialization
